title: Energy and Commerce, Financial Services Republicans Demand Speaker Pelosi Bring House Back to Work to Find Permanent Solution for Renters
description: Washington, DC— Today, Republicans on the House Energy and Commerce Committee and Financial Services Committee, led by Republican Leaders Cathy McMorris-Rodgers (WA-05) and Patrick McHenry (NC-10), sent a letter to Speaker Nancy Pelosi (CA-12). The letter criticizes President Biden’s extension of the unconstitutional eviction moratorium and condemns House Democrats’ inability to find a permanent solution for American renters.

title: Leader Rodgers Statement on President Biden’s Plan to Impose Harsh & Costly Mileage and Emissions Restrictions on Vehicles
description: Washington, D.C. — Republican Leader for the House Energy and Commerce Committee Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement on President Biden’s plan to impose unattainable electric vehicle goals and vehicle mileage and tailpipe emissions standards across the country.
